name: Automated Deal Review Prep
description: Auto-generate deal review summaries by pulling CRM data, recent Gong call highlights, and engagement scores into a single brief before forecast calls.
automation_approach: Integrate Salesforce and Gong APIs to auto-compile deal snapshots into a templated brief, surfacing risk signals and next steps.

name: Competitive Intel Digest
description: Extract competitor mentions from Gong call transcripts and aggregate into a weekly competitive intel report for the field.
automation_approach: NLP pipeline over Gong transcripts to detect competitor names, sentiment, and feature comparisons; auto-publish to Confluence.

name: New Rep Account Assignment
description: Match new reps to territories and accounts based on segment, geography, and historical performance data.
automation_approach: Rule-based engine that balances territory value, travel proximity, and rep ramp stage; auto-updates Salesforce ownership.

name: Quote & Proposal Generation
description: Generate custom proposals with pricing, ROI estimates, and case studies from CRM deal data and approved templates.
automation_approach: Template engine pulling deal data from Salesforce, auto-selecting relevant case studies and computing ROI; output as branded PDF.

name: Win/Loss Analysis Reporting
description: Compile win/loss data with call sentiment, deal timeline, and competitor involvement into monthly leadership reports.
automation_approach: Automated data pipeline from Salesforce close reasons and Gong conversation analytics; generate dashboards and narrative summaries.

name: Campaign Performance Reporting
description: Aggregate multi-channel campaign metrics into a unified weekly report with attribution analysis.
automation_approach: ETL pipeline merging Marketo, GA, and ad platform data into a unified dashboard with automated attribution modeling.

name: Lead Scoring Recalibration
description: Analyze conversion data to recalibrate lead scoring weights and thresholds quarterly.
automation_approach: ML model trained on historical conversion data that auto-suggests scoring weight adjustments; human approval before deployment.

name: Event Lead Routing
description: Route event-sourced leads to the right SDR based on territory, segment, and engagement score within 1 hour of capture.
automation_approach: Webhook-triggered lead routing engine matching lead attributes to SDR assignment rules; auto-notify via Slack.

name: ABM Target Account Refresh
description: Re-evaluate and refresh ABM target account lists based on intent signals, firmographics, and sales feedback.
automation_approach: Automated scoring of accounts using 6sense intent data combined with CRM engagement metrics; flag new adds and removals for review.

name: QBR Deck Auto-Generation
description: Build quarterly business review decks with usage analytics, health scores, ROI metrics, and renewal timeline for each account.
automation_approach: Template engine pulling Gainsight health data, Pendo usage stats, and Salesforce financials into a branded deck; CSM reviews and customizes.

name: Customer Health Scoring
description: Compute and update customer health scores from product usage, support tickets, NPS responses, and engagement frequency.
automation_approach: Real-time health score engine ingesting usage telemetry, ticket sentiment, and engagement cadence; auto-flag at-risk accounts.

name: Renewal Forecast Compilation
description: Aggregate renewal dates, health scores, expansion signals, and risk factors into a monthly renewal forecast.
automation_approach: Automated pipeline combining Gainsight renewal data with Salesforce contract info; ML-based risk prediction for each renewal.

name: Expansion Opportunity Detection
description: Identify upsell and cross-sell opportunities from product usage patterns, growing teams, and feature adoption trends.
automation_approach: Usage pattern analysis identifying teams hitting plan limits, new department adoption, and feature request trends; auto-generate expansion briefs.

name: Ticket Auto-Categorization
description: Automatically categorize and prioritize incoming support tickets based on content analysis and customer tier.
automation_approach: NLP classifier trained on historical ticket data to assign category, priority, and suggested assignee; escalate P1s immediately.

name: Known-Issue Auto-Matching
description: Match incoming tickets against known issues and auto-suggest resolutions or workarounds to agents.
automation_approach: Semantic search over known-issue database and KB articles; auto-attach relevant articles to tickets and suggest macro responses.

name: Bug Report Bridge
description: Auto-create Jira bug reports from support tickets with reproduction steps, customer impact data, and severity classification.
automation_approach: Ticket-to-Jira bridge that extracts structured bug data, deduplicates against existing issues, and links related tickets.

name: KB Article Drafting
description: Draft knowledge base articles from clusters of resolved tickets on the same topic.
automation_approach: Cluster resolved tickets by topic, extract common resolution patterns, generate draft KB articles for human review.

name: Release Notes Compilation
description: Compile customer-facing release notes from merged PRs, Jira tickets, and internal changelog entries.
automation_approach: Parse merged PR descriptions and linked Jira tickets to auto-generate categorized release notes; route for PM review.

name: Incident Triage Automation
description: Auto-triage production incidents by correlating alerts with recent deployments, affected services, and on-call schedules.
automation_approach: Correlation engine matching alert signatures to deployment timeline and service dependencies; auto-page the right on-call engineer.

name: New Hire Environment Setup
description: Provision development environments, repo access, CI/CD permissions, and toolchain configuration for new engineering hires.
automation_approach: IaC-based provisioning triggered by Workday new-hire event; auto-grant repo access, create dev environment, and send onboarding checklist.

name: Dependency Vulnerability Triage
description: Review and prioritize dependency vulnerabilities from automated scans, filtering noise and routing critical patches.
automation_approach: Auto-filter vulnerabilities by reachability and exploitability; create prioritized Jira tickets for critical/high with remediation suggestions.

name: Feature Request Aggregation
description: Aggregate feature requests from support tickets, sales calls, CSM notes, and Productboard into a unified prioritized view.
automation_approach: NLP pipeline extracting feature requests from multiple sources, deduplicating, and scoring by customer segment and revenue impact.

name: Competitive Feature Gap Tracker
description: Track competitor feature releases and map gaps against Gong's roadmap.
automation_approach: Scrape competitor changelogs and press releases, correlate with Gong call mentions, and auto-update gap analysis matrix.

name: New Hire Onboarding Packet
description: Assemble personalized onboarding packets with role-specific docs, system access forms, and 30-60-90 day plans.
automation_approach: Template engine triggered by Greenhouse hire event; pull role data and generate personalized onboarding packet with auto-scheduled meetings.

name: Interview Scheduling Orchestration
description: Coordinate multi-panel interview scheduling across time zones by checking calendar availability and sending invites.
automation_approach: Calendar API integration that finds optimal interview slots across panels, auto-sends invites, and handles rescheduling.

name: Performance Review Coordination
description: Manage the performance review cycle: send reminders, track completion, aggregate calibration data, and flag overdue reviews.
automation_approach: Workflow automation tracking review stage per employee; auto-remind, escalate overdue, and compile calibration dashboards.

name: Revenue Recognition Reconciliation
description: Reconcile monthly revenue recognition entries between billing system, CRM, and general ledger.
automation_approach: Automated three-way reconciliation engine matching Salesforce bookings, billing invoices, and NetSuite GL entries; flag discrepancies for review.

name: Commission Calculation Engine
description: Calculate and validate sales commissions from deal data, quota attainment, SPIFs, and accelerators.
automation_approach: Rules engine encoding commission plans, pulling deal data from Salesforce, computing payouts, and generating statements for rep review.

name: Vendor Invoice Routing
description: Route incoming vendor invoices to the correct budget owner for approval based on PO matching and amount thresholds.
automation_approach: Auto-match invoices to POs, route to budget owner based on cost center, auto-approve under threshold, escalate exceptions.

name: Contract Redlining Tracker
description: Track contract redlining cycles, flag stale negotiations, and auto-surface fallback clause language.
automation_approach: Workflow tracker with clause library integration; auto-suggest pre-approved fallback language and escalate stale contracts.

name: NDA Processing Pipeline
description: Process standard NDAs with auto-approval for template-compliant agreements and routing for non-standard terms.
automation_approach: Document comparison engine checking NDAs against approved template; auto-execute compliant NDAs, flag deviations for counsel review.

name: Security Questionnaire Response
description: Auto-populate security questionnaire responses from a maintained answer library, flagging only novel questions for manual input.
automation_approach: Semantic matching of questionnaire items against pre-approved answer library; auto-fill known answers, queue unknowns for SME input.

name: SaaS Account Provisioning
description: Provision SaaS accounts and access groups for new employees based on role and department.
automation_approach: SCIM-based auto-provisioning triggered by Workday hire event; role-to-app mapping assigns correct access groups in Okta.

name: Access Review & Deprovisioning
description: Conduct periodic access reviews and auto-deprovision accounts for offboarded employees.
automation_approach: Automated reconciliation of Workday employment status with Okta active accounts; instant deprovisioning on termination, scheduled reviews for active.

name: Shadow IT Detection
description: Detect unauthorized SaaS usage by analyzing SSO logs, expense reports, and network traffic patterns.
automation_approach: Log analysis correlating SSO bypass events, SaaS-related expense claims, and DNS queries to identify unapproved tools.

name: SLA Breach Alert Pipeline
description: Monitor ticket age against SLA thresholds and auto-escalate breaches to team leads with context.
automation_approach: Real-time SLA clock monitoring with graduated escalation: warn at 75%, alert at 90%, escalate at breach with full ticket context.

name: Engineering Metrics Dashboard
description: Compile weekly engineering metrics: cycle time, deployment frequency, change failure rate, and MTTR from CI/CD and incident systems.
automation_approach: Automated DORA metrics pipeline pulling from GitHub, Jenkins, and PagerDuty; publish to a live dashboard with trend analysis.

name: Champion Tracking
description: Monitor LinkedIn and email signals to detect when customer champions change roles or leave, triggering re-engagement playbooks.
automation_approach: LinkedIn data monitoring for job changes among tagged champions; auto-alert CSM and trigger account risk review if champion departs.

name: Board Deck Data Assembly
description: Compile financial metrics, ARR waterfall, cohort analysis, and operational KPIs for quarterly board decks.
automation_approach: Data pipeline aggregating financial and operational metrics from source systems; auto-populate board deck template with current figures.

name: Content Calendar Coordination
description: Synchronize content calendar with product launch dates, event schedules, and campaign timelines across teams.
automation_approach: Bidirectional sync between Asana project timelines and Contentful publishing schedule; auto-flag conflicts and send coordination reminders.
